website_summaries.verdict: Whether you need a large amount of extra-long lasting pillar candles for a party, wedding, or emergencies, this 12-pack is a fantastic deal.
pros: 40 hours of burn time per candle

customer_reviews.title: Its a really nice slow burn
customer_reviews.text: These candles last forever! I bought this set for my wedding centerpieces in lanterns. I wanted to test how the candle burned and it passed the test! Its a really nice slow burn, drips into itself rather than down the side for a nice clean look. I've had it burning for about 3-5 hours for the last 4 days and it's still only about half way burned. I highly recommend Bolsius Pillar Candles for your next event.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great 5" white pillar candles
customer_reviews.text: I used these candles inside white lanterns for my wedding as centerpieces. It was hard to find 5" WHITE (not ivory) pillar candles. These fit the bill and worked perfectly! We had them lit for the entire reception and they barely burned down at all. These are great for big events!
customer_reviews.author: LJL

customer_reviews.title: Great for value.
customer_reviews.text: I used these in my centerpieces for my wedding and they turned out great. They came quickly, and were exactly as described held up after hours of burning throughout my reception. There is still plenty of candle left to burn for future uses, I would buy again. Just be sure that the vases are at least 1.5” taller than top of candle if using outside. The wind did blow a few of them out in the beginning and they needed to be relit a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Neon Niki

customer_reviews.title: Smokin
customer_reviews.text: These arrived when promised and were in perfect condition. A little pricey for plain white pillars, but I needed them and they were exactly what I was looking for! They do produce more smoke than I anticipated, so be careful when putting them near anything (wall, or lighter colored items).
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Cerefice

customer_reviews.title: Last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these candles for centerpiece at my wedding. They did last a long time and are very thick. They were outside and the flame never went out. To my knowledge they did drop down the sides. Not sure if a wedding guest (kid) tried to move multiple candles and that’s why there was drip or if they actually drip. I would buy again any time i need this size candle.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy Love

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Wedding Lantern Centerpieces
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these candles for my wedding lanterns and wanted to test them out before the big day. They are the perfect size and color for my lanterns, and when i burned the candle to test it out, it burned slow and cleanly without dripping everywhere. I let the candle burn for 8 straight hours and the candle is not even a quarter of the way gone at the end of it. The wax that melted was on top of the candle and did not drip into my lantern at all. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brie W

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Dripless
customer_reviews.text: We needed some candles for a candelabra for our fireplace. These are a great size for what we needed and seem to last a long time. They look great too. My only issue is that they are only mostly “dripless”. 8 of The 10 candles We’ve used so far don’t drip at all, which is awesome. But 2 have dropped quite a bit. It may have been that the wick wasn’t straight up and I didn’t notice. Not sure. But overall they do the job and look good. PS sorry if my photos are rotated, not sure what’s happening on the upload
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea D.

customer_reviews.title: Added an extra touch to my event!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are great! I used them to personalize my daughters’ baptism. I loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Josephine P.

customer_reviews.title: Candles have bugs in the wax.
customer_reviews.text: These candles are full of nats, little black bugs. As the candle burns down the nats come out and fly. Not sure how this is possible but it’s true. I have pics but can’t get them to load here on amazon . Not sure how to return them?
customer_reviews.author: David Mccrum

customer_reviews.title: The perfect basic candle
customer_reviews.text: I bought these candles mostly for emergencies in case the power goes out. But, I actually use them all the time. I love having a bunch of candles burning at once, but too many scented ones can be overwhelming. These are just basic white unscented candles that burn well and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to measure
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot smaller than they look in pictures! If you are looking for a bigger candle (for example if you are using them for a centerpiece at an 8 person table) do not buy these.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Major drip and overflow
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for our church service as they were less expensive than the previous candles we had used. I would say you get what you pay for. These candles, while presenting very well, our weak walled And create a mess on our candelabras.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a deal not really
customer_reviews.text: Did not burn expected time, did not burn evenly or cleanly. Left a huge mess Should have spend a little more and got better elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: S. Alessandrini

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful elegant white pillar candles
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy having these candles lit in my family room every evening. They provide a warm clean glow. Very happy would purchase again. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: K. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: All good and easy order for a wedding! I’m set with candles for years to come 😉
customer_reviews.author: CMF

customer_reviews.title: I scented candles
customer_reviews.text: As long as they candles are on a candle holder not in a enclosed one they work as designed
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: No scent (as expected which is good) Extremely high quality slow even burn. Gorgeous candles - worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Smith

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in good condition. Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: All arrived in good condition. They do burn inwards. There was only one candle out of two whole packs that leaked over. Barely burned down even for our 3 hour long reception. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L

customer_reviews.title: Very nice plain white candles
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to find good plain white candles. My wife being Catholic likes keeping a candle burning. These are it!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a wedding. Great shape upon arrival; worked great at wedding. Good value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not dripless
customer_reviews.text: These are unscented. Not dripless. They ruined my candle holders and tablecloths
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great value long burning
customer_reviews.text: Great product great value long-burning clean-burning I only wish they would make these with different scents
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hemingway

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pillars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them for my daughter's wedding in January so I haven't used them yet. They are lovely and came on time.
customer_reviews.author: J P Bird

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for decor
customer_reviews.text: I did not intend to actually light these, so I cannot give a review about their longevity, etc. However, I love them here, and they cost much less than I could get them locally.
customer_reviews.author: natural momma

customer_reviews.title: long lasting,
customer_reviews.text: yes long lasting and melts down very evenly...good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product! No issues at all, it burns slowly and does not drip!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cloris Galvan

customer_reviews.title: Classic candle.
customer_reviews.text: These looked very classic inside clear hurricane holders and burned beautifully for 5 hours during an outdoor event. They did drip but dried wax was easy to remove from table cloths.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jean Falco

customer_reviews.title: Unscented, No dripping.
customer_reviews.text: Burns without dripping so far. Works perfectly with spiked candle holders. They are burning very slowly, so I would say good value for $. Candles are unscented which is exactly what I wanted. Overall happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Munch1424

customer_reviews.title: Good quality candles
customer_reviews.text: The wicks are centered so they burn evenly with no dripping. I gently hug the edges when I blow them out to avoid losing the wick in the candle cave. Nice, bright white color. I purchased 2 sizes and I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: K E Jeske

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: The candles burn for many hours, although nowhere could I find just how long they are supposed to burn.
customer_reviews.author: jaguarshaman

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Burned clean and even. Used at son's wedding. Wick s/b snipped as directed online.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great candle
customer_reviews.text: They r working well during all the power outages we are having
customer_reviews.author: haley harman

customer_reviews.title: I like these candles, but I can't use them .
customer_reviews.text: I build Barn Lanterns and need candles that don't drip-these aren't dripless. I just ordered 2-six packs from your company that should work.
customer_reviews.author: walt emerson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, long burning candles
customer_reviews.text: We used these for my daughter's wedding reception. They came nicely packaged and were very slow burning.
customer_reviews.author: Charmy Medlin, Membership Services Director

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, unscented candles
customer_reviews.text: Used these for the centerpieces at my wedding and they were great. Also, I liked that they were a pure white and not ivory.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful candles, and great value!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually burned the candles yet, so I can't speak to their longevity, but they are very lovely; I love the shape and the color; they are exactly as described. They came well-packaged and undamaged. All in all, very nice candles for a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Brusko

customer_reviews.title: Calming
customer_reviews.text: I love that this candle doesn't have a scent and has a good flame for centering prayer and focused meditation. Very good price for quantity too.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly, was packaged well and was just what I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hernon

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with my purchase but have only burned 4 of ...
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my purchase but have only burned 4 of the candles so far. One did not burn well the first night - melted wax went down the side so look for that.
customer_reviews.author: JLB

customer_reviews.title: works for staging perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly for staging. But there is no scent at all.
customer_reviews.author: TAkers

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice candles, we used in lanterns at our daughters wedding and they burned clean and steady. Nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. They burn slowly and evenly.
customer_reviews.text: Needed them for church. They burn very evenly. Only drawback was price but I needed them quickly and they arrived in time.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Truly long burning candlers!
customer_reviews.text: They really do burn for a long long time. Excellent product!

customer_reviews.title: Candles good for any occassion
customer_reviews.text: Power out? Hosting a wedding reception? These candles would be great for both.

customer_reviews.title: Great product-great price!
customer_reviews.text: These are great candles. Perfect for the price! I plan on repurchasing over and over again!

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. I burn candles almost every night during the long winter months.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and lovely candles
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for wedding centerpieces. I haven’t burned them yet but they came carefully packaged and are exactly what I wanted.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great candles!
customer_reviews.text: Candles arrived very quickly and looked beautiful. They lasted hours and looked gorgeous as part of the wedding centerpieces. I couldn’t be happier with them. I will order more in the near future.

customer_reviews.title: Candles look great!
customer_reviews.text: Candles look great but I have not burned them. We are on our 3rd wedding date! Corona has put a damper on our celebration.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a large candelabra that sits it my fireplace. These look beautiful and burn very nice! I’ve ordered them twice and love them. Great quality!

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking candles
customer_reviews.text: Very nice white candles, wish they were a full 3” in diameter but so far the nicest candles I’ve seen!

customer_reviews.title: very nice candles.
customer_reviews.text: very nice candles ... printed on them for an Easter gift ... actually blow dried the message on the candle .. the quality and size were great for the gift.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality candles! I used these for my wedding! Great price! I tried out some cheaper brand candles on amazon and they crumbled! But these were GREAT! Strongly recommend bolsius.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter's Wedding
customer_reviews.text: We used the Bolsius pillar candles for the outdoor patio tables and indoor cake cutting room for our daughter's wedding; the candles were absolutely perfect for both settings.

customer_reviews.title: A great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for my own photograph candles. Inexpensive yet goodly sized for photo gifts. A great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Dajon Hinkletown Cupp

customer_reviews.title: We continue to be amazed at the longetivity of the life of these candles
customer_reviews.text: We continue to be amazed at the longetivity of the life of these candles. We like the coloring of the candle as it burns. Perfect for the patio for a summer hurricane lamp on the patio. They have lasted for several evenings. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Hill

customer_reviews.title: Do not drip.
customer_reviews.text: These candles work great. I really like them because the do not drip much. I am using them in my fireplace. Perfect for my needs.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: They have no scent which I prefer. I use in fireplace, burn evenly and great longevity

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: this is exactly what i wanted ive been looking for this size candles everywhere

customer_reviews.title: Bundle pack
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find candles in a bundle pack. So happy I didn’t have to order single or 3 packs!! Nice bright white.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect. Just as described. Cannot wait to use them

customer_reviews.text: We used these in our table decorations at our daughter's wedding; they were beautiful!

customer_reviews.title: The candles were a nice size and fragrance-free -these are often hard to find ...
customer_reviews.text: The candles were a nice size and fragrance-free -these are often hard to find in stores. However they do not burn completely, without dripping. The non-drip feature is one I would really like; I have bought such candles in the past, maybe at Ikea?.
customer_reviews.author: anne-marie austin

customer_reviews.title: Not drip less
customer_reviews.text: The 1st candle out of this new drip less package candle drips a 3 inch puddle onto my coffee table. So much for drip less.

customer_reviews.text: They claim this is 40 candles and it is only 12. What a complete rip off. Pissed.

customer_reviews.title: they were the perfect size for my wedding center
customer_reviews.text: arrived quickly and undamaged, they were the perfect size for my wedding center pieces

customer_reviews.title: Kinda disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect height and fit for my glass vases. Will be using in my upcoming wedding.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: I don't hate it, but these were advertised as white
customer_reviews.text: Well, I don't hate it, but these were advertised as white, thus I ordered to match tablecloths. They were not white, they were off white or cream, (look beige actually) which, when sitting on a white tablecloth is not what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Packham

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice candles that seem to last forever. I have been burning 1 candle for almost 8 hours a night for a whole week, and the candle is only half gone. Still has a long way to go. Excellent quality candles. Good size wicks that are just right to give you a good burn throughout the candle. This company does it right. I bought the 12 pack, and glad i did. They are handy to have around if the power goes out. They are "no drip" candles. I'm usually very skeptical of false claims. But these candles live up to what they claim. I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike. P

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the set.
customer_reviews.text: The candles were best value for a dozen. They burned evenly and did not flicker excessively or extinguish for the few hours that I used them. All 12 burned in a large room all at once and performed equally.
customer_reviews.author: Donya T Hooks

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: These candles are long burning and a great value. Burn evenly and the wicks are the whole way to the bottom so they burn the whole way down.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy..
customer_reviews.text: Excellent candles, I'm on my second or third order. Heavy and solid, burn a long time and don't tip over. Excellent deal buying as a case, compared to cost of barrel candles individually in stores.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality candles. Burn for a long time. No smell.

product_meta.title: BOLSIUS Set of 12 White Pillar Candles - 2.75-x 5-inch Unscented Candle Set - Dripless Clean Burning Smokeless Dinner Candle - Perfect for Wedding Candles, Parties and Special Occasions
product_meta.description:
BOLSIUS White Pillar Candles - Ideal for wedding, Spas, and Home Decor With 40 Long Burning Hours

Our White pillar candles are an elegant design that promises to provide candle lovers with an excellent experience. Our candles will remind you of everything you love in a candle. Decorate your home, bedroom, restaurant, spas, or wedding with these dripless votive candles by Bolsius for an elegant appeal. It invites positive vibes to a special occasion. The pillar candles are of high-quality wax and cotton wicks. Our unscented candles and feature a single cotton wick with a burn time up to 40 hours which outperforms most other standard candles. The extended burn time allows you to re-use this dripless candle for multiple events, thus adding value to your product. Our White pillar candles will burn smoothly and clean without having the issue of smoke or dripping. The wax used in this pillar candle is of the premium quality which manufactures in Europe. It is guaranteed not to drip or melt away fast.

Bolsius pillar candles feature:

✓ High-quality wax and wick
✓ Dripless and clean burning
✓ Long burn time Up to 40 hours
✓ Unscented and smooth flame
✓ Elegant design
✓ Set content: 12 
✓ Colour: White
✓ Pattern: Solid 
✓ Size: Regular
✓ Shape: Cylindrical
✓ Dimension: 5 inches x 2.75 inches

With our attractive fragrance-free White pillar candles set, any interior design is enhanced tenfold and immediately looks stylish and sophisticated. Bolsius candles sticks are ideal for restaurants, weddings, or your dinner table at home, holiday season. Order now to save more on our value pack of 12 neatly packaged dripless candles.
feature_bullets: EYE-PLEASING UNSCENTED LONG LASTING CANDLES - Create a luxury experience for every occasion with Bolsius White unscented pillar candles. Our pillar candle set enhances the appearance and prevents it from dripping or melting away fast

PERFECT CENTERPIECE CANDLES FOR DECORATIONS - Our wedding candles are perfect for impressing the guests in wedding, parties, spas and home gatherings. The unscented votive candles will also make the ambiance romantic at candlelight dinner. Our White candles pillar feature a classic, smooth sided texture that makes them ideal for adding a whiff of allure to your home, business, or special event.

PREMIUM QUALITY LEAD-FREE DRIPLESS CANDLES - Bolsius unscented candle pack are of highest quality wax, and pure cotton wick, which prevents it from dripping and melting fast and our White pillar candle features cotton wicks which help the clean burning candles to burn clean and smoke-free

40 HOUR LONG BURN TIME - Our dripless pillar candles are 100% unscented. Large size of our clean burning candle makes it ideal for lanterns, centerpieces, and all your candle needs. They are dripless and smokeless, leaving an ambient glow. Enjoy 40 hours of burn time for everyday use and special occasions.

GREAT VALUE PACK - Each White unscented candle set comes with 12 plain candles of 128 mm x 68 mm or 5 inch x 2.75 inch. They come packed securely in a sturdy cardboard box. These thick candles fit standard pillar candle holders set.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars334 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
